# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is a Quarto book, designed to accompany the BM110 semester 2 microbiology workshop. To use this book, you can use the arrows at the bottom of each section, or the hyperlinked menu, to navigate between the different sections (tasks) of the workshop.

::: { .callout-tip }
To prepare for this workshop, you may find it helpful to revise your notes from the BM110 semester 1 workshop on calculations.

:::
